data.text:
FULL LIST OF NFL ALUMNI

DESCRIPTION

Gaines Adams 1st Round pick in the 2007 NFL Draft. Defensive lineman. Jerell Adams 6th round pick in the 2015 NFL Draft. Danny Aiken Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2011. Long Snapper. Super Bowl XLIX Champion. Antonio Allen 7th round pick in the 2012 NFL Draft. Free Safety. Maurice Anderson Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2000. Defensive Tackle. Super Bowl XXXVI Champion. Duane Ashman 5th round pick in the 1997 NFL Draft. Defensive End. Super Bowl Champion in 1998. Akeem Auguste Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2013. Cornerback. Michael Badgley Undrafted free agent. Signed with Indianapolis in 2018. Punter/kicker. Michael Barber Undrafted free agent. Signed with Seattle Seahawks in 1995. Played five years. Isaiah Battle 5th round pick in the 2015 Supplement NFL Draft. Charles Bearoff Signed by the Washington Redskins in 1946. Darryl Blackstock 3rd round pick in the 2005 NFL Draft. Linebacker. Russell Bodine 4th round pick in the 2014 NFL Draft. Offensive lineman. Ken Brown 4th round pick in the 1995 NFL Draft. Linebacker. Tom Brown Signed by the Pittsburgh Steelers in 1942. Dorien Bryant Undrafted free agent by the Pittsburgh Steelers. Wide Receiver. Mike Bulino 17th round pick in the 1975 NFL Draft by Kansas City Chiefs. Defensive Back. Plaxico Burress 1st round pick in the 2000 NFL Draft. Super Bowl Champion. Wide Receiver. Clen Capriola 9th round pick in the 1977 NFL Draft. Running Back. Anthony Castonzo 1st round pick in the 2011 NFL Draft. Offensive Tackle. Tyrell Chavis Undrafted free agent. Defensive Tackle. Signed with the New York Giants in 2018. Erik Christensen 7th round pick in the 1955 NFL Draft. Defensive End. Topper Clemons 8th round pick in the 1986 NFL Draft. Running Back. John Alexander Clowes Signed with the New York Yanks in 1950. Guard/Tackle. Dexter Coakley College Football Hall of Fame. 3rd round pick in the 1997 NFL Draft. Three-time Pro Bowl. Linebacker. Jeremy Cox Undrafted free agent by the Denver Broncos in 2019. Running back. Al Crow 28th round pick in the 1955 NFL Draft. Defensive Tackle. Christian Darrisaw 1st round pick in the 2021 NFL Draft. Offensive Lineman. Jim Davis Undrafted free agent. Defensive End. Signed to the Jacksonville Jaguars in 2005. Josh Davis Undrafted free agent. Signed by Miami Dolphins in 2005. Wide Receiver. Tyrone Davis 4th round pick in the 1995 NFL Draft. Tight End. Antonio Dingle 7th round pick in the 1999 NFL Draft. Defensive Tackle. Ernest Dixon Undrafted free agent. Signed with New Orleans in 1994. Played six seasons in the NFL. Linebacker. John Dorsey 4th round pick in the 1984 NFL Draft. Played five seasons in the NFL. Linebacker. Marcus Dowtin Signed as a undrafted free agent in 2012. Linebacker. Tyronne Drakeford 2nd round pick in the 1994 NFL Draft. Super Bowl Champion. Cornerback. Darren Drozdov Undrafted free agent. Signed with Denver in 1993. Defensive Tackle. Jim Druckenmiller 1st round pick in the 1997 NFL Draft. Quarterback. Rickey Dudley 1st round pick in the 1996 NFL Draft. Played nine year in the NFL. Tight End. Super Bowl XXXVII Champion. Florentino "Frank" Fontes Signed by the Houston Oilers in 1972. Kicker. Jacoby Ford 4th round pick in the 2010 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Will Furrer College Hall of Fame Scholar Athlete. 4th round pick in the 1992 NFL Draft. Quarterback. Eddie George Winner of the 1995 Heisman Trophy. Super Bowl. 4x All-Pro running back. 1st round pick of the 1996 NFL Draft. Played nine years in the NFL. Chris Gerhard Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Philadelphia Eagles in 1987. Defensive Back. DeMingo Graham Undrafted free agent. Signed by the San Diego Chargers in 1999. Offensive Lineman. Played six years. Derwin Gray 7th round pick in the 2019 NFL Draft. Offensive lineman. Dru Grigson Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Minnesota Vikings in 2003. Linebacker. Christian Hackenberg 2nd round pick in the 2016 NFL Draft. Quarterback. Marques Hagans Music City Bowl Champion. 5th round pick in the 2006 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Jay Hagood Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Jets. Offensive Tackle. Steve Hamilton 2nd round pick in the 1985 NFL Draft. Defensive End. Marquis Haynes 4th round pick in the 2018 NFL Draft. Carolina Panthers. Defensive End. John Hilton 6th round pick in the 1964 NFL Draft. Tight End. Played nine years in NFL. Mack Hollins 4th round pick in the 2017 NFL Draft. Philadelphia Eagles. Wide Receiver. Montori Hughes 5th round pick in the 2013 NFL Draft. Defensive End. Carlos Hyde 2nd round pick in the 2014 NFL Draft. Running Back. James Jackson 3rd round pick in the 2001 NFL Draft. Running Back. Kareem Jackson 1st round pick in the 2010 NFL Draft. Cornerback. Cardale Jones 6th round pick in the 2016 NFL Draft. Quarterback. Robert Jones 1st round pick in the 1992 NFL Draft. 3x Super Bowl Champion. Linebacker. Dave Kadela Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Atlanta Falcons in 2001. Played five seasons in the NFL. Zach Kerr Undrafted free agent. Signed by Indianapolis Colts in 2014. Defensive End. Jeff Komlo 9th round pick in the 1979 NFL Draft to the Detriot Lions. Quarterback. Brian Kozlowski Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Giants in 1993. Played in the Super Bowl XXXIII. Tight End. Pasquale "Pat" Lamberti 13th round pick in the 1959 NFL Draft to the Chicago Cardinals. Linebacker. Played three years. John Lascari Signed to the New York Giants in 1942. Brandon London Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Giants in 2007. Wide Receiver. Don Majkowski 10th round pick by the Green Bay Packers in the 1987 NFL Draft. Pro Bowl. Quarterback. Jimmy Martin 7th round pick by the San Diego Chargers in the 2006 NFL Draft. Offensive Lineman. LeRon McCoy 7th round pick by the Arizona Cardinals in the 2005 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Douglas E. McDougald 5th round pick by the New England Patriots in the 1980 NFL Draft. Defensive End. Dick McElwee 28th round pick by the Detroit Lions in the 1944 NFL Draft. Half Back. Billy McMullen 3rd round pick in the 2003 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Steve Meilinger 1st round pick in the 1954 NFL Draft. College Football Hall of Fame. Defensive End. Phillip Merling 2nd round pick in the 2008 NFL Draft. Played six seasons. Defensive End. Tom Miller Played four season in the NFL (1943-46). A member of the Steagles in '43. Defensive End. Josh Morgan 6th round pick in the 2008 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Morgan Moses 3rd round pick in the 2014 NFL Draft. Offensive Tackle. Eric Moss Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Minnesota Vikings in 1997. Offensive Lineman. Yoshua Nijman Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Green Bay Packers in 2019. Offensive Lineman. Don Oakes 3rd round pick by the Philadelphia Eagles in the 1961 NFL Draft. Offensive Tackle. Pro Bowler in 1967. Roman Oben 3rd round pick in the 1996 NFL Draft. Super Bowl Champion. Offensive Tackle. Mark Parson Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2009. Cornerback. Austin Pasztor 1st round pick in the CFL in 2012. Later signed as an undrafted free agent in the NFL. Offensive Tackle. Chris Perry 1st round pick in the 2004 NFL Draft. Played five seasons. Running back. Bobby Phillips Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Minnesota Vikings in 1995. Running Back. Olsen Pierre Undrafted free agent. Signed with the Chicago Bears in 2015. Defensive lineman for the Arizona Cardinals. Robbie Powell Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Cleveland Browns in 2008. Center. Kelcy Quarles Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2014. Defensive Tackle. Mike Quick 1st round pick in the 1982 NFL Draft. 5x Pro Bowl. Wide Receiver. Sonny Randle 4x Pro Bowl. 19th round pick in the 1958 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Derek Rivers 3rd round pick in the 2017 NFL Draft. New England Patriots. Defensive End. Morgan Roane Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Cleveland Browns in 1987. Defensive End. Merrill Robertson Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Philadelphia Eagles in 2003. Linebacker. Tyrone Robertson 7th round pick in the 2001 NFL Draft. Defensive Tackle. Jacob Ruby 1st round pick in the CFL in 2015. Offensive Tackle. Mohammed Seisay Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2014. Cornerback. Ashley Sheppard 4th round pick in the 1993 NFL Draft. Played three seasons. Linebacker. James Wesley Sherrill 10th round pick in the 1951 NFL Draft by the Chicago Bears. Defensive Back. Father of Jay Sherrill. Jay Sherrill Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Dallas Cowboys in 1978. Kicker. Jack Simcsak 17th round pick in the 1971 NFL Draft by the Denver Broncos. Kicker. Lamar Slade Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2003. Wide Receiver. Akil Smith Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Washington Redskins in 2002. Offensive Lineman. C.J. Spillman Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2009. Strong Safety. Played seven seasons. Marquis Spruill Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2014. Inside Linebacker. Linden Stephens Signed as an undrafted free agent in 2018. Cornerback. Terrance Stubbs Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Jets in 2004. Wide Receiver. Shannon Taylor Played four seasons in the NFL from 2000-03. Vinny Testaverde Winner of the 1986 Heisman Trophy. First overall pick in the 1987 NFL Draft. 21 seasons in the NFL. Michael Thomas 2nd round pick in the 2016 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Terrance West 3rd round pick in the 2014 NFL Draft. Running Back. Ernest Wilford 4th round pick in the 2004 NFL Draft. Wide Receiver. Joe Williams 4th round pick in the 2017 NFL Draft. Running Back. San Francisco 49ers. Lee Williamson Undrafted free agent. Signed by the Houston Oilers in 1993. Quarterback. Played four seasons. Jamaine Winborne Played four seasons in the NFL. Cornerback. Larry Winters Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Giants from 1984-1986. Bill Wood Undrafted free agent. Signed by the New York Jets in 1963. Defensive back. Ryan Wood 7th round pick in the 1996 NFL Draft by the Dallas Cowboys. Running Back/Full Back. NFL COACHES Travis Crittenden Assistant Strength & Conditioning Coach for the Kansas City Chiefs from 2012 to 2020. John Dorsey General Manager of the Cleveland Browns from 2017 to present. Former General Manager of Kansas City from 2013-16. Dan Ferens Houston Texans Administration from 1995-2007. Dru Grigson Scout for the Arizona Cardinals from 2013 to present. Patrick McDowell Assistant Strength & Conditioning Coach for the Philadelphia Eagles from 2013 to 2022. Hired as the Eagles Player Development Assistant/Scout in 2022. Shaun Sarrett Offensive Assistant for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 2012 to present. Jon Eric Sullivan NFL Scout for the Greenbay Packers. 2004 to present.
